text: yudaeui yulbeob-eul ttaleuneun ideul-ege geumgihasa gub-i gallajiji a nihan modeun jimseung-eun meogji malla hago sowa yang-ui jibangjildo geumgihadoe deung e but-eo issneun geosgwa jang-e but-eo iss neun geosgwa ppyeowa seokk-yeoissneun geos-eun je-oe haessnola igeos-eun geudeul-i jeojileun dae ga-e daehan bosang-igeoneul hananim-ui malsseum-eun jinlila hayeossnola
